marklogic.body:
I wasn't a so called birther before the press conference. Ok, now I am convinced. So - what is anybody going to do about it? Shouldn't the FBI being doing something? What about the S,S,? We don't want the military doing anything but about now that's better than nothing being done.
What is it I'd like to see done? Have 0 removed from the WH in cuffs. It's not that farÂ fetched.
Here's what I see. Sheriff Arpiao's Cold case net will close in on 0 and the perps who set him up, and have been shielding 0. When the net is about to be set, 0 flees via AF 1. He seeksÂ sanctuary over seas. Perhaps the only negotiaitions is to get the plane back. The US will be so Glad to get rid of that skinny ass they'll settle for just the plane and crew.
Then the press will have a "come to Jesus" moment and reveal everything they know. Politicians all over the US go into hiding or are rounded up and sent to FEMA camps.
Please - don't wake me. I'm enjoyning this dream.
